Package org.lwjgl.odbc

Class SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.odbc.SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, NativeResource, Pointer
    public class SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT {
     SQLCHAR precision;
     SQLSCHAR scale;
     SQLCHAR sign;
     SQLCHAR val[16];
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT

        public SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a SQL_NUMERIC_STRUCT instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
